xwikidoc.name: GroupClassSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
## you can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object
1 Document $doc.name
#set($class = $doc.getObject("XWiki.GroupClass").xWikiClass)
<dl> #foreach($prop in $class.properties) <dt> ${prop.prettyName} </dt> <dd>$doc.display($prop.getName())</dd> #end </dl>
